attributes.action: to stop the unneccary pain and suffring caused by inter breeding pedigree dogs e.g. jealth problems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in a survay of over 1,000 pet owners commiossioned 74% said they were concerned about the issue of inherated health defects in some dog breeds but 38% felt powerless to do anything about it. 65% did not know where to find reliable information about the welfare concernig pedigree dogs
